授業の概要・背景: Spring Intensive English is a twice-a-week course designed to acclimate advanced proficiency first-year students to standard university English course expectations. Students will actively use English as a tool to complete various types of tasks. This will allow students to improve their English skills (reading, writing, listening, speaking), as well as other skills, such as organizing ideas, group work, public speaking etc.
授業方法:
This class will be completed entirely in English. This course aims to improve students’ overall English abilities in all facets of language competency, thus students can anticipate extensive group and pair work, revolving around discussion, critical thinking, and presenting ideas.

Classes will be taught face to face.

Students will need a Gmail account to access Google Classroom. The majority of the assignments and quizzes/short tests will be collected online. IMPORTANT: You must have space in your Google Drive. If your Google Drive is full (15GB) of photos, videos, or other documents, you will not be able to see class material or assignments.

第1回:
Introduction & Orientation
Course Introduction, LMS & technology setup, teacher/student introductions
トピック.授業計画1: Class sessions listed above are subject to change in accordance to the student needs, any changes to the university calendar, and any changes to the learning environment.

評価.学位授与の方針との関連Relationship to Diploma Polic:
各授業科目は、各学部・研究科の定めるディプロマ・ポリシー（DP）・カリキュラム・ポリシー（CP）に基づき、カリキュラム上に配置されています。
DP・CPを意識して本授業科目の学修を進めることで、各学部・研究科の期待する能力が養成されます。
各学部・研究科のDP、CPや教育課程表（授業科目一覧等）は、下記リンクこちらに掲載していますので学修計画の参考にしてください。
